title: 115: Kangaskhan
author: Chris Taylor
description:
Kangaskhan just needs that jelly – also that Mega evolution is some serious hgh…  

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [George](https://twitter.com/misturcheef)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.
